abstract: Criticisms of current theoretical analyses of reasoning, and experimentation upon seven subjects with twenty problems (largely physical in type), led to a formulation of the process of thinking. After the problematic situation is comprehended as containing a conflict, the thinking enters with the penetration into the conflicting circumstances (insight-grasp of the conditions causing conflict), and leads to a realization of the functional value of the insight.
